Text: icruise Flash specialsPST icruisecom flashimagesflashleftheadergif flash flashimagesflashrightheadergif flashborder flashimagesflashleftbordergif imagesspacergif Dear icruise member Things are settling down and all over the country it seems people are looking to get back to their lives A New Year and a new start what can be more American We see it in the demand for cruises and folks inventory is already tightening up This week FLASH brings you something new something familiar and something unusual How about the Norwegian Sea for days from Miami to New York via the Caribbean for just including FREE air and port charges In familiar territory the Carnival Spirit beckons to have fun sailing to the Southern Caribbean for days and only The brand sparkling new Radiance of the Seas also awaits you for days to beautiful Alaska for just port included of course Alex Aliksanyan PresidentCEO PS If you had icruiseMiles on your icruise credit card that day Carnival cruise would be completely FREE flashborder flashimagesflas hsideheadergif flashnamesnorwegianseahGIF flashlogosnorweglGIF flashshotsNorwegianSeaclfljpg flashlifestyleimageschildrenjpgNorwegian Cruise Line Norwegian icruise Flash specialsPST icruisecom flashimagesflashleftheadergif flash flashimagesflashrightheadergif flashborder flashimagesflashleftbordergif imagesspacergif Dear icruise member Are you confused Its summer in January and Christmas in July All this warm weather tells me REAL summer is around the corner to us that means its time for a Costa Cruise Europe will be a hot destination this summer and there is not much inventory many ships have relocated Costa is Europes cruise line famous for fine Italian cuisine and service FLASH this week brings you an amazing cruise aboard the Tropicale with ports to dream about all for Closer to home we suggest the Elation from Carnival cruising the Mexican Riviera for days and just cant beat that Want to feel the heat of the Caribbean join the Carnival Destiny in a wonderful southern odyssey and just all FLASH prices include port Today icruise also announces myIcruise Features capabilities no other site offers all designed to save you our cherished members money There are too many goodies to explain just go to myicruisecom and hold on Alex Aliksanyan PresidentCEO flashborder flashimagesflashsideheadergif flashnamescostatropicalehGIF icruise Flash specialsPST icruisecom flashimagesflashleftheadergif flash flashimagesflashrightheadergif flashborder flashimagesflashleftbordergif imagesspacergif Dear icruise member Cruises cruises and more cruises thats all we dream about during February This is peak booking season and things are off to a spectacular start The cruise lines are still uncertain of the summer months and that means OPPORTUNITY for you In essence prices have risen but not by muchat least not yet FLASH the consummate opportunist begins with a fabulous th of July holiday cruise aboard the Carnival Triumph Just gets you aboard from New York Next we offer the unbeatable service of Holland America aboard the Maasdam All your soft drinks and fancy coffees are FREE hors doeuvres before dinner and only from Ft Lauderdale We end with the cool winds of Alaska aboard the beautiful Norwegian Wind Can you believe just and youre aboard for a serene day cruise Of course all FLASH prices include port charges Alex icruise Flash specialsPST icruisecom flashimagesflashleftheadergif flash flashimagesflashrightheadergif flashborder flashimagesflashleftbordergif imagesspacergif Dear icruise member Although we have had some snow in New York everyones mood at ICruise is sunny January blues Not with these amazin deals If you cant find a room on Burbon Street for Mardi Gras then heres your chance to sail on the Rhaspsody of the Seas on Youll get two full days of fun in New Orleans over Mardi Gras for only including portlimited space so book right now To me theres nothing better then planning your summer vacation now and having some time to look forward to it Celebritys beautiful Constellation has a great itinerary in August for fantastic days in Europe For only including port its a real deal on a brand new ship And the Carnival Spirit has an incredible price for a day Southbound Alaska trip including port is outrageous I knew these rates would chase your blues away Louise Witt VP Operations icruise Flash specialsPST icruisecom flashimagesflashleftheadergif flash flashimagesflashrightheadergif flashborder flashimagesflashleftbordergif imagesspacergif Dear icruise member WOW Its the only reaction that meets the moment Carnival Cruise Line offered me the pleasure of attending the inaugural of the newest fun ship The Carnival Pride Brand spanking new and the definition of FUN the Pride offers you incomparable dining entertainment and relaxation options In honor of the occasion FLASH this week will only offer Carnival specials Get on board this marvelous vessel and cruise the Caribbean for days for only FLASH also has the Prides sister ship the Carnival Spirit cruising the cool glaciers of Alaska for days and only And finally just perfect for a quick fun loving getaway the Imagination stands tall Enjoy it for four spectacular days and only All prices include port Alex Aliksanyan PresidentCEO PS If you had points on your icruise credit card that Pride sailing would be
